Designed By A Nerd

Making people come up to you and say ‚Äúhey, i like your shirt.‚Äù

Started 2018-08-18

Storefront

Designed By A Nerd is a t-shirt shop where I post fun little designs I have created in my spare time. This was born out of a desire to keep making things, however small, as often as I can. If you enjoy any of the designs, please consider sharing this shop with friends or purchasing an item that piques your interest. Hope you enjoy the results!

Purchase designs at the storefront, or do the millennial thing and peruse the instagram feed.
